5000 : 5003\n      if (chainId !== targetChainId) {\n        try {\n          switchChainHook.mutate({ chainId: targetChainId })\n        } catch {\n          // User rejected or error - handled below\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }, [isConnected, chainId, switchChainHook])\n\n  // Save last address when connected\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (address &amp;&amp; isConnected) {\n      setLastAddress(address)\n    }\n  }, [address, isConnected])\n\n  // Handle connection errors\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (connectHook.error) {\n      const error = connectHook.error\n      if (error.message.includes('User rejected')) {\n        toast.error('Wallet connection rejected')\n      } else if (error.message.includes('No Ethereum provider')) {\n        toast.error('Please install MetaMask or connect a wallet', {\n          action: {\n            label: 'Install MetaMask',\n            onClick: () =&gt; {\n              window.open('https://metamask.io/download/', '_blank')\n            },\n          },\n        })\n      } else {\n        toast.error(&#96;Connection error: ${error.message}&#96;)\n      }\n    }\n  }, [connectHook.error])\n\n  // Handle network switch errors\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (switchChainHook.error) {\n      const error = switchChainHook.error\n      if (error.message.includes('User rejected')) {\n        toast.error('Network switch rejected')\n      } else {\n        toast.error(&#96;Network switch error: ${error.message}&#96;)\n      }\n    }\n  }, [switchChainHook.error])\n\n  const handleConnect = () =&gt;\n\n}",

        "contents": "# Codex Agent System Prompt\n\n## Project Overview\n\nThis is the Mantle RealFi Console - a professional dashboard for managing Real-World Assets (RWA) on the Mantle Network. The project helps users understand, evaluate, and optimize RWA yields with an AI copilot for explainable and responsible decision support.\n\n## Technology Stack\n\n- **Framework**: Next.js 16.1.1 (App Router)\n- **UI**: React 19.2.3, Tailwind CSS 4\n- **Language**: TypeScript 5\n- **Wallet Integration**: wagmi, viem (planned)\n- **Database**: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM (planned)\n- **State Management**: React Context API\n- **Charts**: Recharts\n- **Code Quality**: Biome (linting &amp; formatting)\n\n## Project Structure\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\napp/                    # Next.js App Router pages\n  ├── layout.tsx       # Root layout with providers\n  ├── page.tsx         # Home page (redirects to /dashboard)\n  └── dashboard/       # Dashboard pages\ncomponents/            # Reusable components\n  ├── business/       # Business logic components\n  └── ui/             # shadcn/ui components\nlib/                  # Utilities and providers\n  ├── providers/      # Context providers\n  ├── hooks/          # Custom React hooks\n  └── mockData.ts     # Mock data (to be replaced)\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n## Key Features\n\n1. **Portfolio Management**: Track and manage RWA investments\n2. **Asset Analytics**: View asset performance, risk scores, and APY\n3. **Wallet Integration**: Connect MetaMask/WalletConnect wallets\n4. **Network Support**: Mantle Mainnet (5000) and Testnet (5003)\n5. **Data Visualization**: Charts for allocation and yield trends\n\n## Current Implementation Status\n\n### ✅ Implemented\n- UI components and layouts\n- Portfolio summary dashboard\n- Assets table with search and sort\n- Mock data and local state management\n- Dark mode UI\n\n### ⚠️ Partially Implemented\n- Wallet connection (Mock implementation)\n- Asset detail pages (routes exist but pages missing)\n- Add/redeem position modals (UI ready, logic missing)",

        "contents": "### Getting a WalletConnect Project ID\n\n1. Visit [WalletConnect Cloud](https://cloud.walletconnect.com/)\n2. Create a new project\n3. Copy your Project ID\n4. Add it to &#96;.env.local&#96; as &#96;WALLETCONNECT_PROJECT_ID&#96;\n\nNote: WalletConnect is optional. The application works with MetaMask without a WalletConnect project ID.\n\n## Development\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;bash\n# Install dependencies\npnpm install\n\n# Run development server\npnpm dev\n\n# Build for production\npnpm build\n\n# Start production server\npnpm start\n\n# Lint and format code\npnpm lint\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n## Tech Stack\n\n- **Framework**: Next.js 16.1.1 (App Router)\n- **UI**: React 19.2.3, Tailwind CSS 4\n- **Wallet**: wagmi, viem\n- **Database**: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM\n- **State Management**: React Context API\n\n## Network Configuration\n\nNetwork configurations are defined in &#96;lib/config/networks.ts&#96;. The application defaults to Mantle Mainnet (chain ID 5000) but supports switching to Testnet (chain ID 5003) for development and testing purposes.\n\nUser network preferences are stored in browser localStorage and persist across sessions.",
        "signatures": {},

          },
          {
            "text": "3. Copy your Project ID",

          },
          {
            "text": "4. Add it to &#96;.env.local&#96; as &#96;WALLETCONNECT_PROJECT_ID&#96;",

          {
            "text": "# Run development server",

        "contents": "**缺失依赖**:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;bash\npnpm add wagmi viem @tanstack/react-query\npnpm add -D @prisma/client prisma\npnpm add @walletconnect/ethereum-provider\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n---\n\n### 3. 环境配置缺失 🟡\n\n**问题**: README 提到的环境变量未配置\n\n**需要创建 &#96;.env.local&#96;**:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;env\n# 数据库\nDATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:postgres123@localhost:5432/mantle\n\n# WalletConnect (可选)\nWALLETCONNECT_PROJECT_ID=your_walletconnect_project_id\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n---\n\n### 4. 网络配置缺失 🟡\n\n**问题**: README 提到 &#96;lib/config/networks.ts&#96;，但文件不存在\n\n**需要创建**:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;typescript\n// lib/config/networks.ts\nexport const networks = {\n  mantleMainnet: { id: 5000, ... },\n  mantleTestnet: { id: 5003, ... }\n}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n---\n\n## 🎯 实施路线图\n\n### 阶段 1: 基础设施搭建（1-2 周）🔴\n\n**优先级**: 最高\n\n1. **安装依赖**\n   &#96;&#96;&#96;bash\n   pnpm add wagmi viem @tanstack/react-query\n   pnpm add -D @prisma/client prisma\n   &#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n2. **配置 Prisma**\n   - 创建 &#96;prisma/schema.prisma&#96;\n   - 定义数据模型\n   - 运行 &#96;prisma migrate dev&#96;\n\n3. **配置数据库**\n   - 设置 PostgreSQL\n   - 配置 &#96;DATABASE_URL&#96;\n   - 测试数据库连接\n\n4. **创建网络配置**\n   - 创建 &#96;lib/config/networks.ts&#96;\n   - 定义 Mantle 网络配置\n\n---\n\n### 阶段 2: 钱包集成（1 周）🔴\n\n**优先级**: 最高\n\n1. **集成 wagmi**\n   - 创建 &#96;lib/providers/WagmiProvider.tsx&#96;\n   - 配置 MetaMask 连接器\n   - 配置 WalletConnect 连接器\n\n2. **更新 WalletProvider**\n   - 替换 Mock 实现\n   - 使用 wagmi hooks\n   - 实现网络切换\n\n3. **更新 Header 组件**\n   - 集成真实钱包连接\n   - 实现账户切换\n   - 添加网络切换 UI\n\n---\n\n### 阶段 3: API 层实现（1-2 周）🟡\n\n**优先级**: 高\n\n1. **创建 API 路由**\n   - &#96;/api/portfolio&#96; - 投资组合 CRUD\n   - &#96;/api/assets&#96; - 资产数据\n   - &#96;/api/transactions&#96; - 交易历史\n\n2. **数据库查询**\n   - 使用 Prisma Client\n   - 实现数据查询和更新\n   - 添加错误处理\n\n3. **数据同步**\n   - 替换 Mock 数据\n   - 实现客户端数据获取",

        "contents": "│   ├── business/               # 业务组件\n│   │   └── Header.tsx         # 顶部导航栏\n│   └── ui/                     # UI 基础组件\n├── lib/                        # 工具库\n│   ├── providers/              # Context Providers\n│   │   ├── PortfolioProvider.tsx  # 投资组合状态管理\n│   │   └── WalletProvider.tsx     # 钱包连接管理\n│   ├── hooks/                  # 自定义 Hooks\n│   ├── mockData.ts            # 模拟数据\n│   └── utils.ts               # 工具函数\n├── public/                     # 静态资源\n└── [配置文件]\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n---\n\n## 🎨 前端页面设计分析\n\n### 1. 布局结构\n\n#### 根布局 (&#96;app/layout.tsx&#96;)\n- **Provider 层级**: \n  &#96;&#96;&#96;\n  PortfolioProvider (最外层)\n    └── WalletProvider\n        └── Header (固定顶部)\n            └── main (内容区域)\n  &#96;&#96;&#96;\n- **设计特点**:\n  - 全屏布局 (&#96;w-screen h-screen&#96;)\n  - Flex 列布局 (&#96;flex flex-col&#96;)\n  - 强制深色模式 (&#96;dark&#96; 类)\n  - 自定义字体 (Nunito Sans)\n\n#### 仪表板页面 (&#96;app/dashboard/page.tsx&#96;)\n- **布局**: 左右分栏布局\n  - **左侧边栏** (宽度 288px): 投资组合摘要\n  - **右侧主区域** (flex-1): 资产表格\n- **滚动处理**: 两个区域独立滚动 (&#96;overflow-y-auto&#96;)\n\n### 2. 组件设计\n\n#### Header 组件 (&#96;components/business/Header.tsx&#96;)\n**功能**:\n- Logo 和品牌标识\n- 网络状态显示（Mantle Testnet/Mainnet）\n- 钱包连接/断开功能\n- 地址格式化显示\n- 区块浏览器链接\n\n**设计亮点**:\n- 固定高度 56px (&#96;h-14&#96;)\n- 底部边框分隔\n- 响应式按钮状态\n- 下拉菜单交互\n\n#### PortfolioSummary 组件\n**功能模块**:\n1. **总资产管理规模 (AUM)**: 显示总资产价值和 24h 变化\n2. **加权 APY**: 投资组合平均年化收益率\n3. **下次支付日期**: 显示最近的收益支付时间\n4. **风险评分**: 0-100 分制，带风险等级标签\n5. **资产配置饼图**: 使用 Recharts 展示资产类型分布",

          },
          {
            "lineNumber": 90
          },
          {
            "text": "#### 仪表板页面 (&#96;app/dashboard/page.tsx&#96;)",
            "lineNumber": 91
          },
          {
            "text": "- **布局**: 左右分栏布局",
            "lineNumber": 92
          },
          {
            "text": "  - **左侧边栏** (宽度 288px): 投资组合摘要",
            "lineNumber": 93
          },
          {
            "text": "  - **右侧主区域** (flex-1): 资产表格",
            "lineNumber": 94
          },
          {
            "text": "- **滚动处理**: 两个区域独立滚动 (&#96;overflow-y-auto&#96;)",
            "lineNumber": 95
          },
          {
            "lineNumber": 96
          },
          {
            "text": "### 2. 组件设计",
            "lineNumber": 97
          },
          {
            "lineNumber": 98
          },
          {
            "text": "#### Header 组件 (&#96;components/business/Header.tsx&#96;)",
            "lineNumber": 99
          },
          {
            "text": "**功能**:",
            "lineNumber": 100
          },
          {
            "text": "- Logo 和品牌标识",
            "lineNumber": 101
          },
          {
            "text": "- 网络状态显示（Mantle Testnet/Mainnet）",
            "lineNumber": 102
          },
          {
            "text": "- 钱包连接/断开功能",
            "lineNumber": 103
          },
          {
            "text": "- 地址格式化显示",
            "lineNumber": 104
          },
          {
            "text": "- 区块浏览器链接",
            "lineNumber": 105
          },
          {
            "lineNumber": 106
          },
          {
            "text": "**设计亮点**:",
            "lineNumber": 107
          },
          {
            "text": "- 固定高度 56px (&#96;h-14&#96;)",
            "lineNumber": 108
          },
          {
            "text": "- 底部边框分隔",
            "lineNumber": 109
          },
          {
            "text": "- 响应式按钮状态",
            "lineNumber": 110
          },
          {
            "text": "- 下拉菜单交互",
            "lineNumber": 111
          },
          {
            "lineNumber": 112
          },
          {
            "text": "#### PortfolioSummary 组件",
            "lineNumber": 113
          },
          {
            "text": "**功能模块**:",
            "lineNumber": 114
          },
          {
            "text": "1. **总资产管理规模 (AUM)**: 显示总资产价值和 24h 变化",
            "lineNumber": 115
          },
          {
            "text": "2. **加权 APY**: 投资组合平均年化收益率",
            "lineNumber": 116
          },
          {
            "text": "3. **下次支付日期**: 显示最近的收益支付时间",
            "lineNumber": 117
          },
          {
            "text": "4. **风险评分**: 0-100 分制，带风险等级标签",
            "lineNumber": 118
          },
          {
            "text": "5. **资产配置饼图**: 使用 Recharts 展示资产类型分布",
            "lineNumber": 119
          }
        ]
      },

        "contents": "# Project Context\n\n## Purpose\nMantle RealFi Console App is a portfolio management dashboard for Real-World Assets (RWA). Users can view, analyze, and manage their tokenized asset portfolios including treasury bonds, real estate, credit instruments, and cash flow assets. The application provides portfolio analytics, risk assessment, AI-powered copilot assistance, and transaction capabilities.\n\n## Tech Stack\n- **Frontend Framework**: Next.js 16.1.1 (App Router)\n- **UI Library**: React 19.2.3\n- **Language**: TypeScript 5\n- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 4 with custom theme\n- **UI Components**: Radix UI primitives (@radix-ui/react-*)\n- **Database**: PostgreSQL (via Prisma ORM)\n- **State Management**: React Context API with custom providers\n- **Notifications**: Sonner (toast notifications)\n- **Charts**: Recharts\n- **Icons**: Lucide React\n- **Linting/Formatting**: Biome\n- **Package Manager**: pnpm\n\n## Project Conventions\n\n### Code Style\n- **Formatter**: Biome with 2-space indentation, 80 character line width\n- **Quotes**: Single quotes for JavaScript/TypeScript, double quotes for JSX attributes\n- **Semicolons**: As needed (not required)\n- **Trailing Commas**: Always\n- **Arrow Functions**: Always use parentheses for parameters\n- **File Naming**: kebab-case for files, PascalCase for React components\n- **Path Aliases**: Use &#96;@/&#96; prefix for imports from project root\n- **TypeScript**: Strict mode enabled, prefer explicit types\n\n### Architecture Patterns\n- **App Router**: Next.js App Router with Server and Client Components\n- **Component Organization**: \n  - Business components in &#96;components/business/&#96;\n  - Reusable UI components in &#96;components/ui/&#96;\n  - Page-specific components in &#96;app/[route]/components/&#96;\n- **API Routes**: Next.js API routes in &#96;app/api/&#96;\n- **Data Fetching**: \n  - Server-side: Direct database queries in API routes\n  - Client-side: Custom hooks (&#96;usePortfolio&#96;, &#96;useCopilot&#96;, &#96;useWallet&#96;)\n- **State Management**: Context providers for global state (PortfolioProvider, CopilotProvider, WalletProvider)\n- **Service Layer**: API functions in &#96;lib/api.ts&#96;, actions in &#96;lib/actions.ts&#96;",
        "signatures": {},
        "detailedLines": [
          {

            "lineNumber": 19

          {

          {
            "lineNumber": 21

        "contents": "# Mantle RealFi Console - next.js1 分支 Codex 云主机分析报告\n\n**分析时间**: 2026-01-06  \n**分析分支**: next.js1  \n**仓库地址**: https://github.com/Judytimer/Mantle-RealFi-Console/tree/next.js1  \n**最新提交**: aac149d7767d861b411d1fd0570eb31497927fa2\n\n---\n\n## 📋 执行摘要\n\nCodex 云主机已成功克隆并访问了 &#96;next.js1&#96; 分支。分析发现项目处于**功能开发中期阶段**，核心 UI 和组件架构已建立，但关键的 Web3 集成（钱包、数据库）功能尚未完全实现。\n\n**关键发现**:\n- ✅ UI 组件和页面设计完整\n- ⚠️ 钱包集成仍为 Mock 实现（README 提到 wagmi/viem，但代码未集成）\n- ⚠️ 数据库集成未实现（README 提到 Prisma/PostgreSQL，但代码中缺失）\n- ✅ 项目架构清晰，代码质量良好\n\n---\n\n## 🏗️ 项目架构深度分析\n\n### 1. 技术栈对比分析\n\n#### README 声明的技术栈 vs 实际实现\n\n| 技术 | README 声明 | 实际实现 | 状态 |\n|------|------------|---------|------|\n| **Next.js** | 16.1.1 | ✅ 16.1.1 | 已实现 |\n| **React** | 19.2.3 | ✅ 19.2.3 | 已实现 |\n| **TypeScript** | 5 | ✅ 5 | 已实现 |\n| **wagmi** | ✅ 声明使用 | ❌ 未安装 | **缺失** |\n| **viem** | ✅ 声明使用 | ❌ 未安装 | **缺失** |\n| **Prisma** | ✅ 声明使用 | ❌ 未配置 | **缺失** |\n| **PostgreSQL** | ✅ 声明使用 | ❌ 未连接 | **缺失** |\n| **Tailwind CSS** | 4 | ✅ 4 | 已实现 |\n| **Recharts** | - | ✅ 3.6.0 | 已实现 |\n\n#### 依赖包分析\n\n**当前 package.json 依赖**:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;json\n{\n  \"dependencies\": {\n    \"@radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu\": \"^2.1.16\",  // UI 组件",

        "contents": "**缺失依赖**:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;bash\npnpm add wagmi viem @tanstack/react-query\npnpm add -D @prisma/client prisma\npnpm add @walletconnect/ethereum-provider\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n---\n\n### 3. 环境配置缺失 🟡\n\n**问题**: README 提到的环境变量未配置\n\n**需要创建 &#96;.env.local&#96;**:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;env\n# 数据库\nDATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:postgres123@localhost:5432/mantle\n\n# WalletConnect (可选)\nWALLETCONNECT_PROJECT_ID=your_walletconnect_project_id\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n---\n\n### 4. 网络配置缺失 🟡\n\n**问题**: README 提到 &#96;lib/config/networks.ts&#96;，但文件不存在\n\n**需要创建**:\n&#96;&#96;&#96;typescript\n// lib/config/networks.ts\nexport const networks = {\n  mantleMainnet: { id: 5000, ... },\n  mantleTestnet: { id: 5003, ... }\n}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n---\n\n## 🎯 实施路线图\n\n### 阶段 1: 基础设施搭建（1-2 周）🔴\n\n**优先级**: 最高\n\n1. **安装依赖**\n   &#96;&#96;&#96;bash\n   pnpm add wagmi viem @tanstack/react-query\n   pnpm add -D @prisma/client prisma\n   &#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n2. **配置 Prisma**\n   - 创建 &#96;prisma/schema.prisma&#96;\n   - 定义数据模型\n   - 运行 &#96;prisma migrate dev&#96;\n\n3. **配置数据库**\n   - 设置 PostgreSQL\n   - 配置 &#96;DATABASE_URL&#96;\n   - 测试数据库连接\n\n4. **创建网络配置**\n   - 创建 &#96;lib/config/networks.ts&#96;\n   - 定义 Mantle 网络配置\n\n---\n\n### 阶段 2: 钱包集成（1 周）🔴\n\n**优先级**: 最高\n\n1. **集成 wagmi**\n   - 创建 &#96;lib/providers/WagmiProvider.tsx&#96;\n   - 配置 MetaMask 连接器\n   - 配置 WalletConnect 连接器\n\n2. **更新 WalletProvider**\n   - 替换 Mock 实现\n   - 使用 wagmi hooks\n   - 实现网络切换\n\n3. **更新 Header 组件**\n   - 集成真实钱包连接\n   - 实现账户切换\n   - 添加网络切换 UI\n\n---\n\n### 阶段 3: API 层实现（1-2 周）🟡\n\n**优先级**: 高\n\n1. **创建 API 路由**\n   - &#96;/api/portfolio&#96; - 投资组合 CRUD\n   - &#96;/api/assets&#96; - 资产数据\n   - &#96;/api/transactions&#96; - 交易历史\n\n2. **数据库查询**\n   - 使用 Prisma Client\n   - 实现数据查询和更新\n   - 添加错误处理\n\n3. **数据同步**\n   - 替换 Mock 数据\n   - 实现客户端数据获取",

        "contents": "# Codex Agent System Prompt\n\n## Project Overview\n\nThis is the Mantle RealFi Console - a professional dashboard for managing Real-World Assets (RWA) on the Mantle Network. The project helps users understand, evaluate, and optimize RWA yields with an AI copilot for explainable and responsible decision support.\n\n## Technology Stack\n\n- **Framework**: Next.js 16.1.1 (App Router)\n- **UI**: React 19.2.3, Tailwind CSS 4\n- **Language**: TypeScript 5\n- **Wallet Integration**: wagmi, viem (planned)\n- **Database**: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM (planned)\n- **State Management**: React Context API\n- **Charts**: Recharts\n- **Code Quality**: Biome (linting &amp; formatting)\n\n## Project Structure\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\napp/                    # Next.js App Router pages\n  ├── layout.tsx       # Root layout with providers\n  ├── page.tsx         # Home page (redirects to /dashboard)\n  └── dashboard/       # Dashboard pages\ncomponents/            # Reusable components\n  ├── business/       # Business logic components\n  └── ui/             # shadcn/ui components\nlib/                  # Utilities and providers\n  ├── providers/      # Context providers\n  ├── hooks/          # Custom React hooks\n  └── mockData.ts     # Mock data (to be replaced)\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n## Key Features\n\n1. **Portfolio Management**: Track and manage RWA investments\n2. **Asset Analytics**: View asset performance, risk scores, and APY\n3. **Wallet Integration**: Connect MetaMask/WalletConnect wallets\n4. **Network Support**: Mantle Mainnet (5000) and Testnet (5003)\n5. **Data Visualization**: Charts for allocation and yield trends\n\n## Current Implementation Status\n\n### ✅ Implemented\n- UI components and layouts\n- Portfolio summary dashboard\n- Assets table with search and sort\n- Mock data and local state management\n- Dark mode UI\n\n### ⚠️ Partially Implemented\n- Wallet connection (Mock implementation)\n- Asset detail pages (routes exist but pages missing)\n- Add/redeem position modals (UI ready, logic missing)",

    {
      "codeBlock": {
        "relativeWorkspacePath": "./Frontend/openspec/changes/archive/2026-01-02-add-mantle-wallet-integration/design.md",
        "range": {
          "startPosition": {},
          "endPosition": {
            "line": 47
          }
        },
        "contents": "# Design: Mantle Wallet Integration\n\n## Context\nThe application currently uses a mock wallet provider that simulates wallet connection without actual blockchain interaction. To enable real transactions and interactions with tokenized assets on Mantle Network, we need to integrate with real wallet providers and support Mantle Mainnet (chain ID 5000) and Testnet (chain ID 5003).\n\n## Goals / Non-Goals\n\n### Goals\n- Integrate with MetaMask and WalletConnect-compatible wallets\n- Support Mantle Mainnet (5000) as primary network\n- Support Mantle Testnet (5003) for development/testing\n- Allow users to switch between networks\n- Persist user preferences (preferred network, last connected address)\n- Provide clear error messages for connection failures and wrong network scenarios\n- Maintain backward compatibility with existing UI components using wallet context\n\n### Non-Goals\n- Support for non-EVM wallets (Solana, etc.)\n- Custom wallet implementation\n- Multi-wallet simultaneous connections\n- Wallet transaction signing UI (handled by wallet provider)\n\n## Decisions\n\n### Decision: Use wagmi + viem for wallet integration\n**Rationale**: \n- &#96;wagmi&#96; provides React hooks for Ethereum wallet integration with excellent TypeScript support\n- &#96;viem&#96; is a modern, type-safe alternative to ethers.js with better performance\n- Both libraries have excellent MetaMask and WalletConnect support\n- Active maintenance and large community adoption\n- Works seamlessly with Next.js App Router\n\n**Alternatives considered**:\n- &#96;ethers.js&#96; directly: More verbose, less React-friendly, requires manual provider management\n- &#96;web3-react&#96;: Less maintained, more complex API\n- Custom implementation: Too much work, error-prone\n\n### Decision: Default to Mantle Mainnet (5000)\n**Rationale**:\n- Production application should default to mainnet\n- Users can switch to testnet if needed for testing\n- Aligns with real-world asset trading expectations\n\n**Alternatives considered**:\n- Default to testnet: Not appropriate for production\n- Environment-based default: Adds complexity, mainnet should be default",
        "signatures": {},
        "detailedLines": [
          {

          },

            "lineNumber": 2
          },

            "lineNumber": 24
          },
          {
            "text": "### Decision: Use wagmi + viem for wallet integration",

          {
            "text": "**Rationale**: ",

        "signatures": {},

        "contents": "**Alternatives considered**:\n- Default to testnet: Not appropriate for production\n- Environment-based default: Adds complexity, mainnet should be default\n\n### Decision: Store preferences in localStorage\n**Rationale**:\n- Simple, no backend required\n- Persists across sessions\n- Fast access\n- Sufficient for user preferences (network, last address)\n\n**Alternatives considered**:\n- Database storage: Overkill for client-side preferences\n- Session storage: Lost on tab close, less useful\n- Cookies: Unnecessary complexity\n\n### Decision: Auto-prompt network switch\n**Rationale**:\n- Better UX - automatically prompt user to switch if on wrong network\n- Reduces user confusion\n- Standard pattern in Web3 applications\n\n**Alternatives considered**:\n- Manual switch only: Poor UX, users may not know they're on wrong network\n- Auto-switch without prompt: Security risk, should require user approval\n\n## Network Configuration\n\n### Mantle Mainnet\n- Chain ID: 5000\n- RPC URL: https://rpc.mantle.xyz\n- Currency Symbol: MNT\n- Block Explorer: https://explorer.mantle.xyz\n- Testnet: false\n\n### Mantle Testnet (Sepolia)\n- Chain ID: 5003\n- RPC URL: https://rpc.testnet.mantle.xyz\n- Currency Symbol: MNT\n- Block Explorer: https://explorer.testnet.mantle.xyz\n- Testnet: true\n\n## Risks / Trade-offs\n\n### Risk: Wallet not installed\n**Mitigation**: Show clear error message with link to install MetaMask, provide WalletConnect as alternative\n\n### Risk: User rejects connection\n**Mitigation**: Handle rejection gracefully, show user-friendly error message\n\n### Risk: User on wrong network\n**Mitigation**: Detect network mismatch, prompt user to switch, provide one-click network addition\n\n### Risk: Network RPC failures\n**Mitigation**: Use fallback RPC endpoints, show error message if all fail\n\n### Risk: Breaking changes to existing components\n**Mitigation**: Maintain same WalletContext API shape, only change implementation\n\n## Migration Plan\n\n1. Install dependencies (&#96;wagmi&#96;, &#96;viem&#96;, &#96;@tanstack/react-query&#96;)\n2. Create new WalletProvider implementation with real wallet integration\n3.         "contents": "# Project Context\n\n## Purpose\nMantle RealFi Console App is a portfolio management dashboard for Real-World Assets (RWA). Users can view, analyze, and manage their tokenized asset portfolios including treasury bonds, real estate, credit instruments, and cash flow assets. The application provides portfolio analytics, risk assessment, AI-powered copilot assistance, and transaction capabilities.\n\n## Tech Stack\n- **Frontend Framework**: Next.js 16.1.1 (App Router)\n- **UI Library**: React 19.2.3\n- **Language**: TypeScript 5\n- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 4 with custom theme\n- **UI Components**: Radix UI primitives (@radix-ui/react-*)\n- **Database**: PostgreSQL (via Prisma ORM)\n- **State Management**: React Context API with custom providers\n- **Notifications**: Sonner (toast notifications)\n- **Charts**: Recharts\n- **Icons**: Lucide React\n- **Linting/Formatting**: Biome\n- **Package Manager**: pnpm\n\n## Project Conventions\n\n### Code Style\n- **Formatter**: Biome with 2-space indentation, 80 character line width\n- **Quotes**: Single quotes for JavaScript/TypeScript, double quotes for JSX attributes\n- **Semicolons**: As needed (not required)\n- **Trailing Commas**: Always\n- **Arrow Functions**: Always use parentheses for parameters\n- **File Naming**: kebab-case for files, PascalCase for React components\n- **Path Aliases**: Use &#96;@/&#96; prefix for imports from project root\n- **TypeScript**: Strict mode enabled, prefer explicit types\n\n### Architecture Patterns\n- **App Router**: Next.js App Router with Server and Client Components\n- **Component Organization**: \n  - Business components in &#96;components/business/&#96;\n  - Reusable UI components in &#96;components/ui/&#96;\n  - Page-specific components in &#96;app/[route]/components/&#96;\n- **API Routes**: Next.js API routes in &#96;app/api/&#96;\n- **Data Fetching**: \n  - Server-side: Direct database queries in API routes\n  - Client-side: Custom hooks (&#96;usePortfolio&#96;, &#96;useCopilot&#96;, &#96;useWallet&#96;)\n- **State Management**: Context providers for global state (PortfolioProvider, CopilotProvider, WalletProvider)\n- **Service Layer**: API functions in &#96;lib/api.ts&#96;, actions in &#96;lib/actions.ts&#96;",

        "contents": "#### 6. 测试覆盖\n- **问题**: 未发现测试文件\n- **建议**: 添加单元测试和集成测试\n- **优先级**: 🟢 低\n\n#### 7. 国际化\n- **问题**: 硬编码英文文本\n- **建议**: 使用 next-intl 或 i18next\n- **优先级**: 🟢 低\n\n---\n\n## 🚀 性能优化建议\n\n### 1. 代码分割\n- ✅ Next.js 自动代码分割\n- ⚠️ 考虑动态导入大型组件（如图表）\n\n### 2. 数据获取优化\n- ⚠️ 实现服务端数据获取（Server Components）\n- ⚠️ 添加数据缓存策略\n- ⚠️ 使用 React Query 或 SWR 管理服务端状态\n\n### 3. 渲染优化\n- ✅ React 19 并发特性\n- ⚠️ 使用 &#96;useMemo&#96; 优化计算密集型操作\n- ⚠️ 使用 &#96;useCallback&#96; 优化事件处理函数\n\n### 4. 资源优化\n- ✅ 字体本地化加载\n- ⚠️ 图片优化（如果添加图片）\n- ⚠️ 代码压缩和 Tree Shaking\n\n---\n\n## 📝 最佳实践建议\n\n### 1. 项目结构\n- ✅ 目录结构清晰\n- ⚠️ 考虑添加 &#96;types/&#96; 目录统一类型定义\n- ⚠️ 考虑添加 &#96;constants/&#96; 目录存放常量\n\n### 2. 组件设计\n- ✅ 组件职责单一\n- ⚠️ 考虑提取通用逻辑到自定义 Hooks\n- ⚠️ 考虑使用 Compound Components 模式\n\n### 3. 状态管理\n- ✅ Context API 使用合理\n- ⚠️ 考虑使用 Zustand 或 Jotai 替代复杂 Context\n- ⚠️ 考虑使用 React Query 管理服务端状态\n\n### 4. 样式管理\n- ✅ Tailwind CSS 使用规范\n- ⚠️ 考虑提取重复样式到组件类\n- ⚠️ 考虑使用 CSS Modules 处理复杂样式\n\n---\n\n## 🔐 安全性考虑\n\n### 当前状态\n- ⚠️ 钱包地址未验证\n- ⚠️ 交易签名未实现\n- ⚠️ 智能合约交互未实现\n\n### 建议\n1. **输入验证**: 所有用户输入需要验证\n2. **权限检查**: 操作前检查用户权限\n3. **交易安全**: 实现交易确认和错误处理\n4. **API 安全**: 使用 HTTPS 和 API 密钥管理\n\n---\n\n## 📈 功能完整性评估\n\n### 已实现功能 ✅\n- [x] 投资组合展示\n- [x] 资产列表展示\n- [x] 资产搜索和排序",

        "contents": "export default function AddPositionModal({\n  asset,\n  onClose,\n}: AddPositionModalProps) {\n  const { portfolio, refreshPortfolio, isRefreshing } = usePortfolio()\n  const { isConnected, connect } = useWallet()\n  const { address } = useAccount()\n  const chainId = useChainId()\n  const [shares, setShares] = useState(1)\n\n  const handleRefresh = async () =&gt; {\n    try {\n      await refreshPortfolio()\n    } catch (err) {\n      console.error('Failed to refresh portfolio:', err)\n      toast.error('Failed to refresh', {\n        description: 'Please refresh the page manually',\n      })\n    }\n  }\n\n  // Get payment token address for balance check\n  const { paymentTokenAddress } = usePaymentTokenAddress({\n    id: asset.id,\n    name: asset.name,\n  })\n\n  // Read payment token balance\n  const { data: paymentTokenBalance, isLoading: isLoadingBalance } =\n    useReadContract({\n      address: paymentTokenAddress || undefined,\n      abi: ERC20_BALANCE_ABI,\n      functionName: 'balanceOf',\n      args: address ? [address] : undefined,\n      query: {\n        enabled: !!paymentTokenAddress &amp;&amp; !!address,\n      },\n    })\n\n  // Read payment token symbol\n  const { data: paymentTokenSymbol } = useReadContract({\n    address: paymentTokenAddress || undefined,\n    abi: ERC20_BALANCE_ABI,\n    functionName: 'symbol',\n    query: {\n      enabled: !!paymentTokenAddress,\n    },\n  })\n\n  const formattedBalance = paymentTokenBalance\n    ?           "endPosition": {

        },
        "contents": "- ✅ 服务端组件优先\n- ✅ 客户端组件使用 &#96;'use client'&#96; 指令\n- ⚠️ 资产详情页路由已配置但页面未实现\n\n---\n\n## 🎨 UI/UX 设计分析\n\n### 设计系统\n\n#### 颜色方案\n- **主色调**: 基于 HSL 变量系统\n- **语义化颜色**: primary, secondary, destructive, success, warning, muted\n- **深色模式**: 强制启用 (&#96;dark&#96; 类)\n\n#### 组件样式\n- **卡片**: &#96;metric-card&#96; 类，带边框和圆角\n- **标签**: &#96;status-badge&#96; 类，带颜色变体\n- **表格**: 使用 shadcn/ui Table 组件\n- **按钮**: 多种变体 (default, ghost, outline)\n\n#### 交互设计\n- ✅ 悬停效果 (&#96;hover:&#96;)\n- ✅ 过渡动画 (&#96;transition-*&#96;)\n- ✅ 响应式设计\n- ✅ 可访问性考虑（ARIA 标签）\n\n### 用户体验亮点\n1. **实时数据更新**: LocalStorage 同步\n2. **视觉反馈**: 风险评分颜色编码\n3. **数据可视化**: 图表展示资产配置和趋势\n4. **搜索和排序**: 资产表格交互功能完善\n\n---\n\n## 🔍 代码质量分析\n\n### 优点 ✅\n1. **类型安全**: 全面使用 TypeScript\n2. **组件化**: 良好的组件拆分和复用\n3. **状态管理**: Context API 使用合理\n4. **代码规范**: Biome 配置完善\n5. **Git 工作流**: Husky + Commitlint 规范提交\n\n### 需要改进的地方 ⚠️\n\n#### 1. 钱包集成\n- **问题**: WalletProvider 是 Mock 实现\n- **建议**: 集成 Web3 钱包库（如 wagmi、ethers.js）\n- **优先级**: 🔴 高\n\n#### 2. 数据获取\n- **问题**: 使用 Mock 数据 (&#96;lib/mockData.ts&#96;)\n- **建议**: 集成真实 API 或智能合约调用\n- **优先级**: 🔴 高\n\n#### 3. 错误处理\n- **问题**: 缺少错误边界和错误处理\n- **建议**: 添加 Error Boundary 和 try-catch\n- **优先级**: 🟡 中\n\n#### 4. 加载状态\n- **问题**: 缺少加载指示器\n- **建议**: 添加 Suspense 和 Loading 组件\n- **优先级**: 🟡 中\n\n#### 5. 表单验证\n- **问题**: 添加/赎回操作缺少表单验证\n- **建议**: 使用 react-hook-form + zod\n- **优先级**: 🟡 中\n\n#### 6. 测试覆盖\n- **问题**: 未发现测试文件",

This approach helps in avoiding flashes of "empty" data during hydration.<br/><br/>   - **Set Up Cookie Storage in Wagmi Config:**<br/><br/>     ```javascript<br/>     import \{ createConfig, http, cookieStorage, createStorage \} from 'wagmi';<br/>     import \{ mainnet, sepolia \} from 'wagmi/chains';<br/><br/>     export function getConfig() \{<br/>       return createConfig(\{<br/>         chains: [mainnet, sepolia],<br/>         ssr: true,<br/>         storage: createStorage(\{<br/>           storage: cookieStorage,<br/>         \}),<br/>         transports: \{<br/>           [mainnet.id]: http(),<br/>           [sepolia.id]: http(),<br/>         \},<br/>       \});<br/>     \}<br/>     ```<br/><br/>   - **Hydrate Stored Cookies in Wagmi:**<br/><br/>     In your Next.js `app/layout.tsx` file, extract the cookie from the `headers` function and pass it to `cookieToInitialState`. Then, provide this `initialState` to the `WagmiProvider`.<br/><br/>     ```javascript<br/>     import \{ headers \} from 'next/headers';<br/>     import \{ cookieToInitialState \} from 'wagmi';<br/>     import \{ getConfig \} from './config';<br/>     import \{ Providers \} from './providers';<br/><br/>     export default async function Layout(\{ children \}) \{<br/>       const initialState = cookieToInitialState(<br/>         getConfig(),<br/>         (await headers()).get('cookie')<br/>       );<br/>       return (<br/>         <html lang="en"><br/>           <body><br/>             <Providers initialState=\{initialState\}><br/>               \{children\}<br/>             </Providers><br/>           </body><br/>         </html><br/>       );<br/>     \}<br/>     ```<br/><br/>     ([wagmi.sh](https://wagmi.sh/react/guides/ssr?utm_source=openai))<br/><br/>4. **Ensure Correct Order of Providers:**<br/>   The order of providers is essential. Wrap your application components in the following order:<br/><br/>   ```javascript<br/>   <SophonContextProvider><br/>     <WagmiProvider><br/>       <QueryClientProvider><br/>         <SophonWagmiConnector>\{children\}</SophonWagmiConnector><br/>       </QueryClientProvider><br/>     </WagmiProvider><br/>   </SophonContextProvider><br/>   ```<br/><br/>   ([docs.account.sophon.xyz](https://docs.account.sophon.xyz/configuration/wagmi?utm_source=openai))<br/><br/>By following these steps, you should be able to resolve the "Provider not found" error in your Next.js application using Wagmi v3 with SSR. |

## 已完成的修复

1. **添加 Cookie 存储支持**：
   - 在 `wagmi.ts` 中添加了 `cookieStorage` 和 `createStorage`
   - 配置了 `storage: createStorage({ storage: cookieStorage })` 以在服务端和客户端之间持久化状态

2. **配置函数化**：
   - 将配置改为 `getConfig()` 函数，便于在服务端和客户端使用

3. **SSR 状态恢复**：
   - 在 `layout.tsx` 中使用 `cookieToInitialState` 从 cookies 恢复初始状态
   - 将 `initialState` 传递给 `WagmiProvider`

4. **类型修复**：
   - 修复了 `initialState` 的类型，从 `unknown` 改为 `State`

5. **依赖更新**：
   - 已更新到 `wagmi 3.3.1` 和 `@wagmi/core 3.2.1`

## 修改的文件

1. `/Frontend/lib/config/wagmi.ts` - 添加了 cookie 存储和配置函数
2. `/Frontend/lib/providers/WalletProvider.tsx` - 添加了 initialState 支持
3. `/Frontend/app/layout.tsx` - 添加了 SSR 状态恢复逻辑

contractBalance : portfolio.holdings[asset.id] || 0\n\n  // Update slider when balance loads\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (currentShares &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; shares &gt; currentShares) {\n      setShares(Math.floor(currentShares))\n    }\n  }, [currentShares, shares])\n\n  // Sync slider with shares\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (currentShares &gt; 0) {\n      setSliderValue([(shares / currentShares) * 100])\n    }\n  }, [shares, currentShares])\n\n  const handleSliderChange = (value: number[]) =&gt; {\n    setSliderValue(value)\n    const newShares = Math.max(1, Math.floor((value[0] / 100) * currentShares))\n    setShares(newShares)\n  }\n\n  const {\n    redeem,\n    reset,\n    status,\n    hash,\n    error,\n    isPending,\n    isSuccess,\n    canRedeem: canRedeemFromContract,\n    isLoadingCanRedeem,\n  } = \n\n}",
